channel.title: I need help with a command!
channel.description:
alright this is my command
[code] if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("Ahrim")){ Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 2000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1733, 2);//needle Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 581, 4);//black robe Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1015, 4);//black skirt Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1734, 8);//thread }[/code]
in my itemonitem.java i made it so you have to use the needle with the robes and the black skirt to make an ahrim set.
but i know that it deletes the money.. but i want it so if you want to do ::ahrim and you dont have enough money you cant buy it.
this is pali base, 525.

item.title: I need help with a command!

item.description:
@check wrote:

oh, i see. didnt read it the right way lol.

someone else has given me the same code, with that in it. and it didnt work… is there a way though?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with a command!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

why put the engine stuff? just do this:

if(command.startsWith("ahrim") { deleteItem(995, 2000000); addItem(1773, 2); addItem(581, 4); addItem(1015, 4); addItem(1734, 8); }

I use two seperate codes, that’s just my way

if(command.startsWith("ahrim) && Item 995 < 2000000)) { sM("you don't have enough cash!"); return; }

I might be wrong. 99% but its something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with a command!

item.title: I need help with a command!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Add a condition that checks to see if they have that amount of money
Ex.

if (Engine.playerItems.hasItem(p, 995, 2000000)) {

I doubt that that is a real method but that’s what you need to do.

Read full topic
